mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.user_id, a.create_time, a.modify_time,b.is_publish, b.id as ar_id, b.title as ar_title FROM qfeng_edition a LEFT JOIN (select id, title, edition, create_time, user, is_publish from qfeng_article where (is_delete =0 or is_delete is null)) b ON a.id=b.edition WHERE a.is_delete =0 and a.user_id = b.user and a.user_id = #{id} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC, b.create_time DESC
